MetaData.MetaDataItem: -Long press SW_Button at least 10 seconds in HS2SK-Z. - Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted. -Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

The smart metering plug, adopts flame-retardant engineering material and Z-Wave protocol. it can be controlled by APP remotely. It also supports power metering and timing switch, and the function of power, voltage, current overload protection.
- Click [Remove] icon in Z-Wave Controller. - Press the SW_Button 3 times within 1.5s - If remove Process is successful, Green LED is Blinking 6 times, then turn off.
- Click [Add] icon in Z-Wave Controller. - Press the SW_Button 3 times within 1.5s, Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second. - If add Process is successful, Green LED will turn off.
